summary: A sex-crimes specialist from New York travels to the Philippines to help his friend, a Manila homicide detective, solve a series of murders.
cast: Robert Winston|Katherine Henryk|Yvonne Nielson|Vic Diaz|Vic Silayan|Eddie Infante|Bruno Punzalan|Judy Dennis|Max Roio|Ching Tello|Minda Morena|Isidro Francisco|Felix Marfil
title: Blood Thirst
